lines: He loves to fly. <click> <click> Yes, he loves it so much that even in his sleep, his wings do not stop fluttering.
He is my first kongamato. <click> <click> We have been through much together. He is the sole reason we are known as the kintamer.

obj.n: Pulvérisation<Indent/>: les Égarés prennent la mouche
Pulvérisation<Indent/>: une plante à l'épreuve du feu
Pulvérisation<Indent/>: sus aux suceurs de sang
Pulvérisation<Indent/>: secouer les puces aux dragons
